original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying, If anyone sins unintentionally in any of the Lord's commandments about things not to be done, and does any one of them,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 누구든지 여호와의 계명 중 하나라도 그릇 범하였으되

sentences.original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying,
in any of the Lord's commandments
about things not to be done,
and does any one of them,
